reviews.review: Love this game, took me forever to beat it but if you enjoyed the first you'll def enjoy the second, alot more character and personality aswell as new mechanics to make the puzzles more fun. People love valve games, if only they made more.
I love the New Story and WHEATLEY XD XD XD
great but i wish it had more of joe in it
"It has a little something for everyone"
its old but pog nice story puzzles u have to use ur brain to pass 1-4 chapters i like how the ability is new and thats it
one of the best games of all time

the coop is long enough, has good puzzle and playing with your friends adds more fun
